publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1399 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2004-That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2004 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry*

S2M-1399 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2004-That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2004 be approved.
